verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H0413"\w* end, \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H1732"\w* obtaineth \w the|strong="H0413"\w* inheritance. \w A|strong="H1732"\w* \w psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w of|strong="H0413"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

\w Give|strong="H0238"\w* \w ear|strong="H0238"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w*, \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* cry.

Hearken \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* prayer, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* thee \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H1242"\w* pray: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* thou shalt \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* morning \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* stand \w before|strong="H3808"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0859"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* see: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* thou art \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* willest iniquity.

\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wicked|strong="H0205"\w* dwell \w near|strong="H3808"\w* thee: \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w unjust|strong="H0205"\w* abide \w before|strong="H2962"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

Thou hatest \w all|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* workers \w of|strong="H0376"\w* iniquity: Thou wilt \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* \w all|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* \w lie|strong="H3577"\w*. \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w bloody|strong="H1818"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w deceitful|strong="H4820"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w abhor|strong="H8581"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0935"\w* \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* thy mercy, \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* towards thy \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*, \w in|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w fear|strong="H3374"\w*.

\w Conduct|strong="H1870"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w justice|strong="H6666"\w*: \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* enemies, direct \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* truth \w in|strong="H7130"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*; \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w heart|strong="H7130"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* vain.

\w Their|strong="H3588"\w* throat \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* open sepulchre: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* dealt deceitfully \w with|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* tongues: judge \w them|strong="H5307"\w*, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. Let \w them|strong="H5307"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w from|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w devices|strong="H4156"\w*: according \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* wickedness \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* \w them|strong="H5307"\w* \w out|strong="H5080"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* provoked thee, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* Lord.

\w But|strong="H5921"\w* \w let|strong="H8055"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* hope \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thee: \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H8034"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, \w and|strong="H5769"\w* thou shalt dwell \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*. \w And|strong="H5769"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w love|strong="H0157"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w shall|strong="H8034"\w* glory \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thee:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* thou wilt \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w*. \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, thou hast \w crowned|strong="H5849"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w shield|strong="H6793"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w good|strong="H7522"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w*.
